title: NaNDA Voter Registration, Turnout, and Partisanship by County, United States, 2004-2018
description: This dataset contains counts of voter registration and voter turnout for all counties in the United States for the years 2004-2018. It also contains measures of each county's Democratic and Republican partisanship, including six-year longitudinal partisan indices for 2006-2016.
creator: Chenoweth, Megan
Li, Mao
Gomez-Lopez, Iris N.
Kollman, Ken
publisher: University of Michigan. Institute for Social Research
provider: Healthy Regions & Policies Lab, University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign
subject: Demographics
Social and Community Context
spatial_resolution_note: Warning: Alaska and island territories are excluded in this dataset
methods_variables: Registered voters, Ballots cast, Voting population, CVAP, Voter turnout, voter registration, PRES_DEM_VOTES, PRES_REP_VOTES, SEN_DEM_VOTES, SEN_REP_VOTES, PRES_DEM_RATIO, PRES_REP_RATIO, SEN_DEM_RATIO, SEN_REP_RATIO, Longitudinal, Time Unit
data_variables: REG_VOTER_TURNOUT_PCT, REG_VOTERS, VOTER_TURNOUT_PCT, REG_VOTERS_PCT, CVAP: Citizen voting age population, PARTISAN_INDEX_DEM, PARTISAN_INDEX_REP, SEN_REP_RATIO
data_usage_notes: This dataset was created to explore the relationship between voter engagement (as expressed through registration and turnout rates), partisan political leanings, community health, and public policy.
